entry.title: Incident with Codespaces
entry.content:
Jul 28, 04:21 UTC
Update - We have identified an issue that impacts Codespaces customers in the East US region. We are working to mitigate the problem.

Jul 28, 03:49 UTC
Update - We are working to mitigate an issue that impacts Codespaces customers in the East US region.

Jul 28, 03:15 UTC
Update - We have resolved an issue that impacts Codespaces customers in the West US 2 region. We are continuing to mitigate the problem in the East US region.

Update - We are working to mitigate an issue that impacts Codespaces customers in the West US 2 and East US regions. We will continue to keep you updated on progress.

Update - We have identified an issue that impacts Codespaces customers in the West US 2 and East US regions. We will continue to keep you updated on progress as we attempt mitigation.

entry.title: Incident with GitHub Actions
entry.content:
Jul 18, 16:09 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jul 18, 15:40 UTC
Update - Actions has been experiencing delayed start times. Runs should be back to normal now, but we're continuing to keep an eye on this issue.

Jul 18, 14:39 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for GitHub Actions.

entry.title: GitHub Enterprise Importer Maintenance
entry.content:
Jun 29, 19:56 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jun 29, 17:48 UTC
Update - Migrations to GitHub using the GitHub Enterprise Importer are currently paused. Migrations will still queue, but won't run until the pause is removed. The pause is expected to be lifted by 20:30 UTC.

Jun 29, 16:26 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jun 29, 16:24 UTC
Scheduled - Migrations to GitHub using the GitHub Enterprise Importer are currently paused. Migrations will still queue, but won't run until the pause is removed.
